篧篧篧

篧字的基本解释

篧
zhuó
捕鱼用的罩。

篧
huò
取鱼竹器。

篧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》側角切，入覺，莊。］
用细竹编成的捕鱼用的罩。
[②]［huò］
［《集韻》黄郭切，入鐸，匣。］
取鱼竹器。

篧字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篧； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页895第05
【廣韻】【韻會】士角切【集韻】仕角切，?音浞。【廣韻】魚罩。【爾雅·釋器】篧謂之罩。【註】捕魚籠。【疏】李巡云：編細竹以爲罩，捕魚也。孫炎云：今楚篧也。然則罩以竹爲之，無竹則以荆，故謂之楚篧，皆謂捕魚是也。　又【集韻】側角切，音捉。竹角切，音斲。義?同。　又【集韻】胡故切【字彙補】何悞切，?音?。【詩·小雅】烝然罩罩。【註】篧也。　【集韻】同籱。

篧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
篧字的起名意思

暂无。

creel

creel
huò
Take fish and bamboo utensils.

["Guangyun" side angle cut, enter the sense, Zhuang. ]
A fishing cover made of thin bamboo.
[②]［huò］

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　篧; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 895 05
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Club] Shijiao cut [Jiyun] Shijiao cut,? Yinchan. [Guangyun] Fish cover. 【Erya·Release Device】Zi said the cover. [Note] Fishing cage. [Sparse] Li Xunyun: Weave thin bamboo for a cover, and also for fishing. Sun Yanyun: Chu Zhu is also today. However, bamboo is used for the cover, and jing is used for no bamboo, so it is called "Chuzhu", which is also called fishing.　[Jiyun] Cut the side corners, catch the sound. Cut bamboo horns, sound moan. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] Hu Guqie [Word Supplement] He Xieqie,? Yin?. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Suiran covered. [Note] Zhu also.　【Jiyun】Same as Lai.
